, will henceforth concentrated on "strategic projects, in particular working on new products." Although Eric Schmidt is stepping down as chief executive, Google said he will take on the role of Executive Chairman, focusing externally on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership-- all of which are increasingly important given Google's global reach. Internally, he will continue to act as an advisor to Larry and Sergey Brin . Under BSF, every secondary school in England was due to be rebuilt or refurbished over a 15-20-year period at an estimated cost of Â£ 55 billion. Michael Gove said the programme had been beset by massive overspends, tragic delays, botched construction projects and needless bureaucracy. The decision is a further embarrassment for the Education Secretary who was forced to apologise last summer after he released a flawed list of school building projects facing the axe. of Evansville political science professor. If Mike Pence is to encounter any bumps at all, they could come early, as he shifts his focus from federal to state issues, Robert Dion said.
